title: Dashboard Service
description: This schema defines the Dashboard Service entity, such as Looker and Superset.

dashboardServiceType.description: Type of Dashboard service - Superset, Looker, Redash or Tableau.

id.description: Unique identifier of this dashboard service instance.

name.description: Name that identifies this dashboard service.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this dashboard service.

serviceType.description: Type of dashboard service such as Looker or Superset...

description.description: Description of a dashboard service instance.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

dashboardUrl.description: Dashboard Service URL. This will be used to make REST API calls to Dashboard Service.

ingestionSchedule.description: Schedule for running metadata ingestion jobs.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to this dashboard service.

changeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

deleted.description: When `true` indicates the entity has been soft deleted.
